alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 8:36AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Gulf, Wakulla, southeastern Liberty, Jefferson, northwestern Taylor, eastern Leon, Franklin, northwestern Madison, southern Thomas and southwestern Brooks Counties through 915 AM EDT/815 AM CDT/... At 836 AM EDT/736 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles south of Thomasville to 9 miles west of Crawfordville to 6 miles east of Port St. Joe. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Carrabelle, Monticello, Florida State University, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, Port St. Joe, Boston, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Franklin, Greenville, Sopchoppy, Lake Bradford, Alma and Cody. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
